website_summaries.verdict: A unique arched design that can fold down for portability, making it a great companion for a laptop. Plenty of features
pros: This versatile mouse can double as a presentation remote with its unique touchpad design
cons: The battery life is on the shorter side
Some customers found the touchpad awkward to use

customer_reviews.title: Classic case of jack-of-all, master-of-none
customer_reviews.text: PROs: > Looks really slick > Folds down very compactly > Many connectivity options, seem to all work well > Lots of built-in functionality CONs: > Cheap feeling build (completely PLASTIC body and parts) > Ergonomically awkward as a mouse - no hand support and not weighted enough to use comfortably > Scroll pad (center mouse button) is utter garbage and either doesn't track or scrolls way too fast > Touchpad presentation controls are a bit impractical - with no buttons to feel for, one may have to look down to actually locate the virtual button

customer_reviews.title: Good idea, poor design and execution, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Simply put, it doesn’t hold a charge. I bought this 5 months ago, and have used it sparingly when I work from home. In the past, it would take forever to charge, but would maintain the charge for a couple of hours- perfect for what I needed it to do. Now (5 months later), it doesn’t work at all because it cannot hold a charge whatsoever! My window of return as expired. I will be more than happy to change this review if someone from customer service department reaches out to me for either a refund or a replacement.* update* amazon has great customer service and was refunded for this. Thank you.

But a nice product overall and good value for it's price, especially if you are looking for something that alternates between a mouse and a presentation remote control.
